fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A Plant Killing and a Plant Production will always spawn
- Factional chat
- No factional kill until all Plant Killings are dead
- Members produce sun at night, which is shared between all members and can be spent by any of them to use abilities. The Plants start with 3 sun.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who may oppose the Plants.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Kill anyone who may oppose the Plants.
